comment:
* Exception thrown when a {@link android.app.admin.DevicePolicyManager} operation failed because it * was not safe to be executed at that moment. * *

For example, it can be thrown on * {@link android.content.pm.PackageManager#FEATURE_AUTOMOTIVE automotive devices} when the vehicle * is moving.

methods.name: public List<Integer> getReasons()
methods.comment:
* Gets the reasons the operation is unsafe.
     *
     * @return currently, only valid reason is
     * {@link android.app.admin.DevicePolicyManager#OPERATION_SAFETY_REASON_DRIVING_DISTRACTION}.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
